full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,PHUGS NOR BCU'I BSLAB BYA'I 'GREL PA DON SBYOR GSUM LDAN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,ZHES PA 'DI NI NGES PA DON GYI DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN TSE 'DI BLOS BTANG ZHING TSE PHYI MDON DU GNYER BA, TSANGS PA BRGYA BYIN GYI GOS MING BRTAGS SHVA BA'I RMI LAM DU MTHONG BYA BRAG BA TSUL KHRIMS RNAM RGYAL GYI ZHABS LA RJES SU BZUNG RGYAL KHAMS PA DON GRUB RGYAL MTSAN GYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DGE TSUL 'JAM 'PHRIN NO, ,MANGGA LAm,, ,,
